index.pageDescription: Shard Bot is a Discord bot that allows you to manage your Discord server.

features.title: Shard offers you:
features.antinuke: Prevent the destruction of your server.
features.antiraid: Prevent raiders and malicious users from attacking your server.

showcase.automodDescription: Shard automatically moderates your server with efficiency.
showcase.moderationDescription: Shard haves a variety of moderation commands to help you moderate your server.
showcase.utilitiesDescription: And also a variety of utilities to help you manage your server.
showcase.loggingDescription: Be aware of what's happening on your server with Shard's logging system.

servers.pageDescription: Log in to access the dashboard.
servers.noServer: Don't see your server? & and log in again

index.pageDescription: Manage Shard Bot from this panel.
index.title: Dashboard

general.pageDescription: Manage Shard Bot from this panel.
general.title: General
general.note: * Inputs have maximum and minimum values, if you don't follow the rules, the value will be reset to the default value.
general.prefixPlaceholder: Set the bot's prefix (between 1 and 6 characters)

tooltips.prefix: The bot's prefix. The bot will respond to commands with this prefix.
tooltips.trusted: Users will be able to edit the bot's settings and be exempt from anti-nuker and anti-spam modules.
tooltips.join: The channels where the bot will log when a user joins the server.
tooltips.exit: The channels where the bot will log when a user leaves the server.
tooltips.mod: The channels where the bot will log when a moderator performs an action.
tooltips.bot: The channels where the bot will log server events.

antispam.pageDescription: Manage Shard Bot from this panel.
antispam.title: Anti-Spam
antispam.note: * Inputs have maximum and minimum values, if you don't follow the rules, the value will be reset to the default value.
antispam.permissionsNote: * Some options may be disabled because you're not in the "trusted users" list.
antispam.resetTimeoutDesc: How much time should pass before the trigger percentage is reset
antispam.percentageDesc: How much the percentage should increase (every time the action triggers) before punishing a user (When it reaches 100%, the user will be punished)
antispam.whitelistUsersDesc: Users that are exempt from the system
antispam.whitelistRolesDesc: Roles that are exempt from the system

antinuker.pageDescription: Manage Shard Bot from this panel.
antinuker.title: Anti-Nuker
antinuker.note: * Inputs have maximum and minimum values, if you don't follow the rules, the value will be reset to the default value.
antinuker.permissionsNote: * Some options may be disabled because you're not in the "trusted users" list.
antinuker.whitelistUsersDesc: Users that are exempt from the system
antinuker.whitelistRolesDesc: Roles that are exempt from the system

modulesDescriptions.maxBans: The maximum amount of people that a user can ban under 5 minutes
modulesDescriptions.maxCreatedEmojis: The maximum amount of emojis a user can create under 5 minutes
modulesDescriptions.maxDeletedEmojis: The maximum amount of emojis a user can delete under 5 minutes
modulesDescriptions.maxCreatedRoles: The maximum amount of roles a user can create under 5 minutes
modulesDescriptions.maxDeletedRoles: The maximum amount of roles a user can delete under 5 minutes
modulesDescriptions.maxCreatedChannels: The maximum amount of channels a user can create under 5 minutes
modulesDescriptions.maxDeletedChannels: The maximum amount of channels a user can delete under 5 minutes
modulesDescriptions.maxKicks: The maximum amount of kicks a user can have under 5 minutes
modulesDescriptions.maxUnbans: The maximum amount of unbans a user can have under 5 minutes
modulesDescriptions.maxInviteBots: If the user can invite unverified bots

lockdown.pageDescription: Manage Shard Bot from this panel.
lockdown.title: Lockdown
lockdown.note: * Inputs have maximum and minimum values, if you don't follow the rules, the value will be reset to the default value.
lockdown.permissionsNote: * Some options may be disabled because you're not in the "trusted users" list.
lockdown.whitelistUsersDesc: Users that are exempt from the system
lockdown.whitelistRolesDesc: Roles that are exempt from the system

automod.pageDescription: Manage Shard Bot from this panel.
automod.title: Auto-Mod
automod.note: * Inputs have maximum and minimum values, if you don't follow the rules, the value will be reset to the default value.
automod.permissionsNote: * Some options may be disabled because you're not in the "trusted users" list.
automod.whitelistUsersDesc: Users that are exempt from the system
automod.whitelistRolesDesc: Roles that are exempt from the system
